title: Ep 45: Everyday Product Picks with Eva Chen
itunes:title: Ep 45: Everyday Product Picks with Eva Chen
itunes:subtitle: This week, Kate and Doree share their most essential — and least glamorous — products that they can’t live with out. (Let’s hear it for medicated wipes and Q-tips!) Plus, Kate tries a new Vitamin C serum and deals with a stomach bug, and Doree shares a...
description:
This week, Kate and Doree share their most essential — and least glamorous — products that they can’t live with out. (Let’s hear it for medicated wipes and Q-tips!) Plus, Kate tries a new Vitamin C serum and deals with a stomach bug, and Doree shares a recipe for a delicious dish.

Then they welcome Eva Chen, head of fashion partnerships at Instagram and former editor-in-chief of Lucky magazine. Eva talks about experimenting with fashion and dressing for yourself, the women who inspired her new picture book Juno Valentine and the Magical Shoes, how she implements self-care while working in digital media, and her stripped down, 2-step skincare (!!!) routine.

Follow us on Instagram: @Forever35podcast, @katespencer, @doree, Twitter: @forever35pod, and in our Facebook group (password is "serums"). All products mentioned on the show can be found on our website, Forever35podcast.com. To leave us a voicemail, call 781-591-0390, or you can email us at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • Rothy’s - Go to Rothys.com and enter code forever35 for free shipping.
  • Lola - For 40% off all subscriptions visit mylola.com and enter forever35 when you subscribe.
  • Phlur - Go to Phlur.com and use promo code forever35 for 20% off your custom Phlur sample set.
  • Four Sigmatic - Visiting FourSigmatic.com/forever35 and use promo code forever35 for 15% off all orders.
  • HUM - To get 20% off go to humnutrition.com and use code forever35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
